channel.title: Teaching on Joel Mackenzie
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on Joel Mackenzie

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I am currently the course coordinator and lecturer for INFS3200: Advanced Database Systems at the University of Queensland. I have previously been a tutor and/or a lab assistant for the following courses at RMIT University: COSC1105/COSC1007: Computing Theory COSC2406/COSC2407: Database Systems COSC1112/COSC1114: Operating Systems Principles ISYS1078/ISYS1079: Information Retrieval COSC2531: Programming Fundamentals (Head Tutor)
